entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,69}{F813,1,403002}I found this city by accident while{F801}I was searching around places the{F801}Ashura-kai had sealed.{F801}{F802}But, man, this place is bizarre.{F801}No wonder it's been closed off from{F801}the outside world for a while...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,69}{F813,1,403002}I found this city by accident while{F801}I was searching around places the{F801}Ashura-kai had sealed.{F801}{F802}But, man, this place is bizarre.{F801}No wonder it's been closed off from{F801}the outside world for a while...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,69}{F813,1,403002}From what I've heard, the people here{F801}seem to have survived by eating beef{F801}that they raise here.{F801}{F802}But... have you seen any actual cows?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,69}{F813,1,403002}From what I've heard, the people here{F801}seem to have survived by eating beef{F801}that they raise here.{F801}{F802}But... have you seen any actual cows?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,69}{F813,1,403002}We've decided to hunt demons for the{F801}people here.{F801}{F802}If we left now, I'd feel like I was{F801}abandoning them.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,69}{F813,1,403002}We've decided to hunt demons for the{F801}people here.{F801}{F802}If we left now, I'd feel like I was{F801}abandoning them.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403042}It seems that the people here haven't{F801}been eating demon meat at all.{F801}{F802}I'm surprised that they've managed{F801}to survive this long with that kind{F801}of diet...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403042}It seems that the people here haven't{F801}been eating demon meat at all.{F801}{F802}I'm surprised that they've managed{F801}to survive this long with that kind{F801}of diet...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403042}Beef is an extremely expensive{F801}delicacy. In fact, it's more like{F801}a fantasy now.{F801}{F802}Seriously it's a luxury that even the{F801}Ashura-kai would go mad for.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403042}Beef is an extremely expensive{F801}delicacy. In fact, it's more like{F801}a fantasy now.{F801}{F802}Seriously it's a luxury that even the{F801}Ashura-kai would go mad for.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403042}I feel bad for these guys, cut off{F801}from the outside world and taken{F801}advantage of by demons.{F801}{F802}I hope they learn to like demon meat,{F801}after all that time they spent with{F801}their... beef.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403042}I feel bad for these guys, cut off{F801}from the outside world and taken{F801}advantage of by demons.{F801}{F802}I hope they learn to like demon meat,{F801}after all that time they spent with{F801}their... beef.{F801}
